definition[0]: a small leather, cloth, or plastic bag that you can keep things in, and which is sometimes attached to a belt
definition[1]: a large bag for carrying letters or papers
definition[2]: a pocket in the side of a bag such as a rucksack
definition[3]: a pocket of skin on the stomach which marsupials such as kangaroos use for carrying their babies
definition[4]: a fold of skin like a bag which animals such as hamsters or squirrels have inside each cheek to carry and store food
